ygData.subject: Get a life everybody
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC:Okay i go away for 6 hours, when i get back i have to read 200 mails. What is worng here. To many mails. Why can t all of you get a life. Maybee we should

OOC:Okay i go away for 6 hours, when i get back i have to read 200 
mails. What is worng here. To many mails. Why can't all of you get a 
life. Maybee we should make a limit of mails sent in a day so peoe 
dont have to readd 1000 mails if they go away for a weekend. GET A 
LIFE.
